meanings.definition: (of a disease) regularly found in a particular animal population
meanings.sent1: The enzootic illness affected many animals in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The vet explained that the enzootic disease was common among the local wildlife.
meanings.sent3: The zookeepers had to deal with the enzootic outbreak in a calm manner.
meanings.sent4: The enzootic virus spread through the animal community like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The enzootic infection left a lasting impact on the ecosystem.

meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of a disease that is prevalent in a particular animal population
meanings.sent1: Researchers studied the enzootic patterns to understand the disease better.
meanings.sent2: The enzootic nature of the virus made it challenging to control.
meanings.sent3: The enzootic situation at the farm was a topic of concern among the farmers.
meanings.sent4: The enzootic threat loomed over the livestock industry.
meanings.sent5: The enzootic characteristics of the illness were well-documented by scientists.
